job.title: Machine Learning Engineer Intern
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: ltstronggtltugtAbout ProveltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtProve is the modern platform for continuous identity authentication and is used by over 1000 enterprises and 500 financial institutions including 9 of the top 10 US banks Proves cloud solutions and ltstronggtmobile intelligenceltstronggt driven APIs can be easily orchestrated to increase Approve Rates to over 90 enabling companies to authenticate customer identities accurately effortlessly and privately while mitigating fraud Proves solutions are available in 195 countries For the latest updates from Proveltstronggt follow us on LinkedIn ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAs we continue to scale our company we are looking for people who know how to make an impact Were talking selfstarting professionals who thrive in a fastpaced environment process information quickly and make intelligent decisions The work is challenging and requires not only smarts but natural curiosity and tenacity Teamwork is also important to us  we work together and play togetherltbrgtltbrgtProve has big plans were excited and optimistic about the future If this sounds like a career for you  come check us outltbrgtltbrgtWe are looking for an intern to join our A technical team in designing building and deploying machine learning solutions into production Prove is building a platform to solve some of the worlds biggest unsolved security problems in a completely novel way leveraging passive signals from a users mobile device to protect them from bad guys This is an opportunity to be a part of something truly unique and gamechangingltbrgtltbrgtWe are looking for naturalborn builders who are comfortable in multiple technical areas have creative problemsolving skills a love for coding and technology and a get stuff done attitudeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWhat You Are Accountable ForltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBe a member of a highperforming team of software engineers and machine learning experts building a new mobile identity platformltligtltligtTake ownership be creative and think outside the box to invent and build solutions to realworld customer problemsltligtltligtInterface with our worldclass machine learning researchers to help turn core research into realityltligtltligtWrangle and perform experiments on petabytescale data setsltligtltligtWear many hats to make things happen in a dynamic startup environmentltligtltligtBring your own unique expertise to the team and learn from othersltligtltligtEnjoy tight collaboration with your teammatesltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtIdeal Candidates Will HaveltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtHave 6 months or more of industry experience delivering quality software used by customersltligtltligtExcellent coding skills in an objectoriented language Go Python Rust Java C Ruby etcltligtltligtExperience working with high volumes of data ideally with machine learning playing a critical roleltligtltligtStrong foundational knowledge of mathematics bonus if related to machine learning or signals processingltligtltligtA breadth of technical skills and knowhow to use the right tool for the jobltligtltligtHigh motivation and ability to learn new technologies and domains ltligtltligtA positive cando attitude and bring a passion for excellence to the workplaceltligtltligtExcellent collaboration and communication skillsltligtltligtProfessional experience with AWS Kubernetes a bonusltligtltligtKnowledge of cybersecurity signals processing or experience working with timeseries data a bonusltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtThis position description should not be considered the final description of the position It should be assumed that we would to some extent structure responsibilities in accordance with the successful candidates capabilities and changing business conditionsltbrgtltbrgtltemgtProve is an equal opportunity employer committed to providing equal employment opportunity for
